markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Powerful Leap](/Feats.aspx?ID=5189) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You can jump 5 feet up with a vertical Leap without making a High Jump. You also increase the horizontal distance when you Leap, including as part of a High Jump or Long Jump, by 5 feet.
name: Powerful Leap

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Jump farther and higher
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Standard" > Powerful Leap Source Player Core pg. 260 2.0 Prerequisites Expert in Athletics --- You can jump 5 feet up with a vertical Leap without making a High Jump. You also increase the horizontal distance when you Leap, including as part of a High Jump or Long Jump, by 5 feet.
